casebody.data:
Thomas P. RICHARD, Sr., petitioner,
v.
DISTRICT ATTORNEY OF WESTMORELAND COUNTY, PENNSYLVANIA, et al. No. 18-6503. Supreme Court of the United States Jan. 7, 2019.

Motion of petitioner for leave to proceed in forma pauperis denied, and petition for writ of certiorari to the United States *866Court of Appeals for the Third Circuit dismissed. See Rule 39.8.
